p: Thank you for the letter and for the reviewer’s comment. We would like to report that our MS was revised to meet PLOS ONE’s publication criteria. We respond to each point raised by the academic editor and reviewers during the review process. To comply with your suggestions, we requested a professional English language editing company, Editage, to copyedit thoroughly our manuscript for language usage, clarification on technical expression, spelling, and grammar and any typographical or grammatical errors are corrected at revision to help the readability of the paper.
